text:
Bern (Flamatt) - Switzerland | Full Time | Scout24

Scout24 (http://www.scout24.ch) owns the biggest classified sites for cars, jobs and real estates in Switzerland. We are looking for an online marketing manager to join our marketing-team. Experience with Google AdWords, Google Analytics and a strong internet affinity is a plus. Check out http://www.jobscout24.ch/de/job/online-marketing-manager/230... for more information.
